sqlMap.select: select * from SUBCATEGORY where categoryId = #categoryId# order by name

select SUBCATEGORY.*, CATEGORY.name as categoryName from SUBCATEGORY, CATEGORY WHERE SUBCATEGORY.deleted = 0 AND CATEGORY.deleted = 0 AND SUBCATEGORY.categoryId = CATEGORY.id order by CATEGORY.name, SUBCATEGORY.name
select * from SUBCATEGORY where name = #name# and categoryId = #categoryId#
sqlMap.update: update SUBCATEGORY set name = #name#, deleted = #deleted# where ID = #id#
update SUBCATEGORY set deleted = 1 where id = #id#
